wikipedia_page.main: Mervyn Horatio Herbert, 17th Baron Darcy de Knayth, styled Viscount Clive (7 May 1904 – 23 March 1943) was a British peer and Royal Air Force officer.

response: * March 23 – Mervyn Herbert, Viscount Clive, British peer, army officer (killed on active service in aviation accident) (b. 1904)
* 14 March – Mervyn Herbert, Viscount Clive, British peer, army officer (killed on active service in aviation accident) (born 1904)
